alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:01PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clark County through 630 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Greenwood, or 10 miles north of Neillsville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Loyal around 610 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Chili, Hog Corners, Highway 73 And 98, Chili Corners, Christie, Veefkind, Lynn, Sidney, County Roads H And K and Highway 95 And 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
